title: Wuthering Heights
description: Wuthering Heights is a novel about passionate love, revenge, and social barriers, primarily focusing on the tumultuous relationship between Catherine Earnshaw and Heathcliff. The story, set on the Yorkshire moors, explores their intense bond, its tragic consequences, and the destructive impact of social class and revenge on their lives and the lives of those around them.

title: Jane Eyre
description: a coming-of-age story following the orphaned Jane as she navigates childhood hardship, becomes a governess, and experiences love and loss. She confronts societal expectations, her own internal struggles, and the secrets surrounding the enigmatic Mr. Rochester, ultimately achieving independence and finding happiness on her own terms.
